items.title: The Case of the Erotica Author Arrested in Australia
items.description: Her novel is disturbing in the extreme, but it would certainly qualify as protected speech under the First Amendment in the U.S.

items.title: A Bad Game of Legal Twister Won’t Block Ohio’s SAFE Act
items.description: A state appellate court twisted itself into knots to prevent the state’s law restricting medicalized gender transition for minors.

items.title: Trump Takes Aim at Collective Bargaining in the Federal Workforce
items.description: Trump should use executive power where he can to curtail collective bargaining in the public service, but the solution must ultimately come from Congr...

items.title: Where Do You Draw the Line?
items.description: While I concede the legality of the administration’s move against Rumeysa Öztürk, I reject its morality and prudence.
